coverage: Global (Americas + Europe + Middle East + Africa + APAC, English-only notes)

rules.notes: United Arab Emirates Tax Registration Number.
Antigua & Barbuda Business Number / TIN; request ABST/IRD letter.
Anguilla TIN/Business Taxpayer Identifier; verify with Inland Revenue.
American Samoa uses U.S. EIN for entities.
Barbados TIN/BRN via BRA; verify with certificate.
Bermuda does not have a public VAT/EIN; use Taxpayer/Business Registration No. from Office of the Tax Commissioner.
Caribbean Netherlands (Bonaire, Saba, St. Eustatius) use Dutch/Belastingdienst BES identifiers; collect CRIB/TIN.
Bahamas TIN used for VAT; 9 digits commonly used.
Bhutan Corporate Income Tax / Tax Payer Number.
Belize TIN used for GST/Income Tax.
UID suizo; sufijos de IVA opcionales.
China Unified Social Credit Code (18 chars).
Colombia NIT con dígito de verificación.
Costa Rica; también cédula física para personas.
Costa Rica legal entity ID (10 digits).
Cuba Número de Identificación Tributaria; collect ONAT certificate.
DIČ para VAT; IČO para registro (8 dígitos).
VAT UE; además existe Steuernummer local.
Denmark CVR (8 digits). VAT is DK + 8 digits.
Dominica TIN; confirm with IRD doc.
Dominican Republic Registro Nacional de Contribuyentes.
Finland Business ID; VAT is FI + 8 digits.
Falkland Islands tax identifiers vary; collect company number or TIN.
United Kingdom UTR (10 digits). VAT is GB + 9 digits.
Grenada TIN; confirm with IRD/Tax letter.
Greenland uses Danish systems for some registrations; request official document.
Guatemala NIT; may include check digit.
Guam uses U.S. EIN for entities.
Hong Kong Business Registration Number (8 digits).
St. Kitts & Nevis TIN; verify with Inland Revenue doc.
Kuwait Civil ID for tax; use CR for entities (varying formats).
Cayman Islands TIN for AEOI; format varies; use TIN or Company Registration No.
Saint Lucia TIN / VRN; confirm with IRD doc.
Monaco uses SIREN/SIRET formats akin to France.
Northern Mariana Islands use U.S. EIN.
Montserrat TIN; confirm with Inland Revenue.
Mauritius Business Registration Number; VAT separate.
Malaysia formats vary; GST suspended since 2018.
New Zealand GST (9 digits). NZBN is 13 digits (separate).
Panamá RUC con DV; formatos varían por tipo de contribuyente.
Saint Pierre and Miquelon uses French identifiers (SIREN/SIRET) for businesses.
Puerto Rico businesses typically use EIN; many start with 66.
Empresas en Puerto Rico usan EIN; prefijo 66 frecuente.
Número de Identificação de Pessoa Coletiva (Portugal).
El Salvador NIT (often shown with dashes).
Sint Maarten TIN for business; formats vary, verify via chamber/Tax Admin.
Turks & Caicos TIN; confirm with Revenue Department.
Trinidad & Tobago Board of Inland Revenue number.
IRS Employer Identification Number for entities.
St. Vincent & the Grenadines TIN/VRN; confirm with IRD letter.
British Virgin Islands Taxpayer ID; companies also have BVI Company Number (VIRRGIN).
U.S. Virgin Islands use EIN; request DOR letter.
South Africa VAT (10 dígitos) / Company reg separado.

fallback.notes: Fallback when a country-specific rule is unavailable; require official document + OCR verification.
